      • occupy

        public SizeConstraint occupy(SizeConstraint available)
        Description copied from interface: Widget
        Occupy is called by Molecula every time a relayout is requested (for example: in case of a screen size update).
        Specified by:
        occupy in interface Widget
        Parameters:
        available - the maximum space available for this widget
        Returns:
        the minimum size that this layout needs

      • render

        public void render(RenderPass renderPass)
        Description copied from interface: Widget
        Render in accordance with the specified render pass. To do this use RenderPass.renderInPhase(moe.nea.molecula.RenderPass.Key, java.util.function.Consumer<moe.nea.molecula.RenderContext>) along with RenderPass.Key. Do not do conditional logic outside the RenderPass.renderInPhase(moe.nea.molecula.RenderPass.Key, java.util.function.Consumer<moe.nea.molecula.RenderContext>) callback, as that might influence the RenderPass calculator and prevent part of your GUI from being rendered at all.
        Specified by:
        render in interface Widget
